title: OutreachEvent
description: Schema for a document in the 'OutreachEvent' collection. Represents a scheduled volunteering event or drive. | This schema is not verified, and only generated based on data, use carefully and verify and remove this.

uid.description: The User ID (UID) of the organizer who created the event.

title.description: The public title of the outreach event.

description.description: A detailed description of the event's purpose and activities.

helpType.description: The category of help being provided (e.g., 'Counselling and Mentoring').

status.description: The current status of the event (e.g., 'approved').

approved.description: Boolean flag indicating if the event has been officially approved.

conscentStatus.description: Indicates if consent requirements have been met (specifics depend on business logic).

isFlagged.description: Indicates if the event has been flagged for review.

flaggedByUser.description: The ID of the user who flagged the event, if applicable.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the event was created. Represents a Firestore Timestamp.

eventDate.description: The general date of the event. Represents a Firestore Timestamp.

eventStartTime.description: The specific start time of the event. Represents a Firestore Timestamp.

eventEndTime.description: The specific end time of the event. Represents a Firestore Timestamp.

totalSlots.description: The maximum number of volunteer slots available.

interests.description: A counter tracking how many users have expressed interest in the event.

location.description: The physical location where the outreach event will take place.

skills.description: A list of skills required for the event (e.g., 'Counseling and Support').

participants.description: A list of users who have signed up/participated. (Assumed to be User IDs based on standard patterns).

helpRequest.description: A list of associated HelpRequest IDs linked to this outreach event.
